## Computing Information 

* Install the most recent version of R on your computer from https://cran.r-project.org. This software does most of the analysis that we need.
* RStudio Desktop: install the latest version from https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download. THis provides a nice interface to the R software.
* R strength comes from contributed packages, made by researchers across the globe. You will need to install these as necessary for different parts of the unit.
